text: Kɛlɛ tama, siɛgi zu nuɓusɛiti ti ʋaazu la fɛti voloiti, ga ti nɔkɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wu, zɔi a lɛɛna ga nu ɠɔʋɛzu ʋelei ma ziɠidaʋɛ ga é nɔkɔ, naa ɠa ɠula ga nu yeezazu ʋelei ma ziɠida ʋelei. Zɔi a lɛɛna ga nu yeezazu ʋelei ma ziɠida ʋelei, naa ɠa ɠula ga nu ɠɔʋɛzu ʋelei ma ziɠida ʋelei. Nu nɔpɛ ge mina ɠula ga siɠida ʋelei nii tɛai la, kɛlɛ kɛni ɛsɛ ge ɠula ga zɔɔma ziɠida ʋelei ti laa letegai ɓɔɠɔ ma.
